pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Cholesky LDL Decomposition of Symmetric Matrices // 'C++' implementation of sparse LDL decomposition of symmetric matrices and solvers described by Timothy A. Davis (2016) https ://fossies.org/linux/SuiteSparse/LDL/Doc/ldl_userguide.pdf. Provides the header file 'SparseChol.h' that specifies the 'SparseChol' class to implement sparse LDL decomposition in 'Rcpp' functions. A limited set of 'R' functions that implement the method are also included.
